allFieldsHydrated.title: If all dynamic fields in message template are hydrated

entityId.title:
The id used to get hydration information
Such as, partner id used to get partner information to hydrate partner related dynamic fields in message template

feedbackThemes.title: Feedback themes that are used to categorize the response evaluations

ListResponseEvaluationsResponseSummary.title:
The summary of the response evaluations, only returned if `summarize` is true in the request
The summary is cached based on the `subject_participant` and `created_after` and `created_before` filters for 12 hours
The summary is not specific to the `paging_options`, it considers as many evaluations as possible within the time range

namespaces.title:
The namespaces of the widgets e.g. "ABC", "AG-123"
Use either namespace or options.namespaces

widgetTypes.title: The types of the widget e.g. "inbox-pro", "my-listings"

internalParticipantId.title: the internal participant id (IAM or Contact)

messageId.title: The message ID of the message that has the tool call definition

selectedOptionIds.title: One or more unique identifiers representing the user's selected options

MakeToolCallRequestMessageOption.title: Tool calls can be suggested by AI in a message, this field contains the message and options selected by the user

examples.title: Examples of the theme, these are real examples of responses that are categorized under the theme

iamUserId.title: The IAM User ID of the user who last updated the AI System Message

systemMessageBody.title: The body of the AI System Message

systemMessageId.title: The id of the AI System Message

updated.title: The timestamp when the AI System Message was updated

v1AIThought.description: Represents a single streamed reasoning or progress thought from the AI assistant.

firstLineAddress.title: Address first line of the participant

secondLineAddress.title: Address second line of the participant

contactId.title: The id of the CRM contact

email.title: The email address of the lead

phone.title: The phone number of the lead

aiEmailEnabled.title: Determines if ai email capabilities are available for the organization referred to by subject_participant

aiPlatformEnabled.title: Determines if ai platform capabilities are available for the organization referred to by subject_participant

aiVoiceEnabled.title: Determines if ai voice capabilities are available for the organization referred to by subject_participant

availabilityMessage.title: Availability Message is a message displayed at the top of inbox for your organization

createdAt.title: The time that the configuration was created at

facebookMessengerEnabled.title: Determines if facebook messenger is available for the organization referred to by subject_participant

googleBusinessMessagesEnabled.title: Determines if google business messages is available for the organization referred to by subject_participant

instagramMessagingEnabled.title: Determines if instagram messaging is available for the organization referred to by subject_participant

multiLocationEnabled.title: Determine if Multi location is available for the organization referred to by subject_participant

showAvailabilityMessage.title: Determines if a availability message is displayed

smsEnabled.title: Determines if sms is available for the organization referred to by subject_participant

updatedAt.title: The last time the configuration was updated

webChatEnabled.title: Determines if web chat is available for the organization referred to by subject_participant

whatsappEnabled.title: Determines if whats app is available for the organization referred to by subject_participant

instanceId.title:
A uuid that is used to uniquely identify the conversation among a set of conversations between the same subject participants
If only one conversation is expected between a set of subject participants, this field should be ""

metadata.title: metadata can represent any kind of value

v1ConversationChannel.description:
- CONVERSATION_CHANNEL_PERSONAL_EMAIL: Personal email via Gmail/Outlook platform integration.
Message content is stored in Email service (TrackedMessageContent), retrieved via tracked_message_id metadata.

created.title: The time when the export was created

errorCode.title: Error code indicating what went wrong (e.g., "notFound", "sendNotificationFailed")

fileName.title: The name of the file containing the exported conversations

recipientEmail.title: The email address to which the export will be sent

requestId.title: The unique identifier of the export conversation process

updated.title: The time when the export was last updated

userId.title: The user ID of the user who requested the export

greetingMessageId.title: The message id for the greeting message

widgetParticipantToken.title: The widget_participant_token containing data about the widget user

businessProfile.title: Will be used to determine if a business profile data source should be associated

businessWebsite.title:
Will be used to determine if a business website data source should be associated
This will also depend on the business having their website field filled

endTime.title: End of the export period. Includes messages created before this timestamp

startTime.title: Start of the export period. Includes messages created after this timestamp

workflowId.title: The workflow ID of the export conversation process

v1ExportStatus.title: Enum representing the status of the export process

endTime.title: The end time of the export period

startTime.title: The start time of the export period

v1Filters.title: Message representing the filters applied to the export

channels.title: Deprecated: The list of channels messages can be sent on

v1GetConfigurationResponse.title: GetConfigurationResponse will return a configuration for a given subject participant

v1GetConversationViewsResponse.title: GetConversationViewsResponse will return participant conversation views

configurations.title: The configurations for a list of subject participants

v1GetMultiConfigurationResponse.title: GetMultiConfigurationResponse will return multiple configurations for a given subject participants

disableParticipantBranding.title: Options the requester wants to hydrate participants with branding information on the response

disableParticipantHydration.description: Option to disable participant information hydration on the response, such as name, email, address, etc.

participants.title:
list of participants
Deprecated: use participant instead

accentColor.title: Accent color for the widget secondary elements

accentTextColor.title: Accent text color for the widget secondary elements

assistantAvatarUrl.title: assistant_avatar_url is the url of the AI assistant avatar

assistantName.title: assistant_name is the name of the AI assistant

color.title: A hex color code for the widget, e.g. "#FF0000"

customGreetingMessage.title: The custom greeting message that shows up as first message

enableGreetingMessage.title: Enable the greeting message from AI assistant

hideMobileCta.title: Hide the popup CTA on mobile screens

isEnabled.title: Whether the webchat for the widget config is enabled

name.title: Name of the widget, e.g. "Mountain Media Support"

namespace.title: The namespace of the widget e.g. "ABC", "AG-123"

poweredByName.title: The company name for the widget footer (either current namespace or parent namespace)

poweredByWebsite.title: The company website for the widget footer (either current namespace or parent namespace)

showFooterContent.title: Show the footer content on the widget (configured on the partner business app configuration)

skipContactCapture.title: Deprecated: not meant to be used in the Web Chat client

textColor.title: The text color for the widget

welcomeMessage.title: The welcome message for the webchat for the widget config

widgetTopSpace.title: Height between the widget top and the screen in pixels

v1GlobalParticipantType.title: Participant Type that replaces Type the Type enum in Participant message

aiSystemMessages.title: The list of AI System Messages

hasMore.title: Whether there are more AI System Messages to fetch

nextCursor.title: The cursor to fetch the next page of AI System Messages

templates.title: All message templates for a given SubjectParticipant

mediaContentType.title: media content type is a two part identifier for file types (e.g. image/jpeg)

mediaLocationPath.title: media location path on a GCP bucket

mediaUrl.title: media url is the url of the media content

aiThinkingDuration.description: Duration of AI thinking before final response.

aiThoughts.description: AI reasoning or thinking generated during response creation.

media.title: media is the media content of the message

metadata.title: metadata can represent any kind of value

originalContent.title: original_content is the original content of the message

v1Message.title: Message represents a message of a conversation

v1MessageStatus.title: MessageStatus represents the status a message is

templateId.title:
A unique RESTful identifier. The format will be used for providing template
discoverability and categorizing them.
Example: /business-id/AG-123/template-id/TEMPLATE-123

v1MessageType.description: - MESSAGE_TYPE_FORM_SUBMISSION: Form Submission messages have been moved to events
v1MessageType.title: MessageType represents the type of a message

cursor.title: cursor can be passed to retrieve the next page of results keyed by the cursor

pageSize.title: page_size specifies the number of items to return in the next page

hasMore.title: Whether or not more results exist

nextCursor.title: A cursor that can be provided to retrieve the next page of results

email.title: the email address of the participant

externalParticipantId.title: the external participant id from 3rd party integrations

internalParticipantId.title: the internal participant id (IAM or Contact)

isParticipantInternalInfoDeleted.title:
If an accountGroup or Customer is deleted the internal
info will be missing and will not be shown in the conversation

isSubjectParticipant.description:
Participant is a "subject participant"
If a message is sent by an SMB to a Partner,
then `is_subject_participant` is true for both SMB and Partner
NOTE: we might add a new field in the future to indicate if a
subject participant is in the `subject_participant_key`
this will be a different boolean from `is_subject_participant`.

namespaceHierarchy.title:
the namespace hierarchy of the participant
this field is used to determine the organization hierarchy that the participant belongs to

phoneNumber.title: the phone number of the participant

profileImageUrl.title: the profile image url of the participant

namespaceHierarchy.title:
the namespace hierarchy of the participant
this field is used to determine the organization hierarchy that the participant belongs to

v1ParticipantType.title: the participant type determines the type of a participant in a conversation

aiFacebookProductActive.title: Whether the AI product is active for the Facebook channel

aiInstagramProductActive.title: Whether the AI product is active for the Instagram channel

aiPlatformEnabled.title: Determines if ai platform capabilities are available for the organization referred to by subject_participant

aiSmsResponderEnabled.title: Determines if ai sms responder is available for the organization referred to by subject_participant

aiVoiceEnabled.title: Determines if ai voice capabilities are available for the organization referred to by subject_participant

comment.title: The comment of the response evaluation

conversationId.title: The conversation id of the response evaluation

createdAt.title: The time the response evaluation was created

eventId.description: The event id of the response evaluation; this will be empty if there is a message id.

messageId.title: The message id of the response evaluation

subjectParticipants.title: The subject participants associated the response evaluation's conversation

skipMessageDelivery.title: option to skip message delivery if the message channel is a external provider

conversationId.title: The conversation ID the message was sent to

messageId.title: The unique identifier of the message

createdAt.title: The created timestamp of the message

messageId.title: The unique identifier of the message

v1UpsertConfigurationResponse.title: UpsertConfigurationResponse is the response from creating or updating a a configuration

v1UpsertProductFeatureResponse.title: UpsertProductFeatureResponse is the response from updating or creating product feature availability

created.title: The time that the view was created at

accentColor.title: Accent color for the widget secondary elements

accentTextColor.title: Accent text color for the widget secondary elements

additionalPromptInstructions.title: The prompt provided by a user to be used as additional instructions for the web chat AI assistant

allowedUrls.title: A list of urls that the widget is allowed to be embedded on

assistantAvatarUrl.title: The avatar URL of the AI assistant

assistantId.title: Output only. The ID of the AI assistant associated with this widget

assistantName.title: The name of the AI assistant

color.title: A hex color code for the widget, e.g. "#FF0000"

created.title: The timestamp when the widget was created

customGreetingMessage.title: The custom greeting message that shows up as first message

embedHistory.title: The history of widget installations (typically the domain/hostname of the referer URL the widget is embedded on)

enableGreetingMessage.title: Enable the greeting message from AI assistant using the custom greeting message

hideMobileCta.title: Hide the popup CTA on mobile screens

isEnabled.title: Whether the webchat for the widget config is enabled

name.title: Name of the widget, e.g. "Mountain Media Support"

namespace.title: The id of the namespace, e.g. "ABC", "AG-123"

skipContactCapture.title: Whether the widget has contact capturing enabled

textColor.title: The primary text color for the widget

updated.title: The timestamp when the widget was updated

welcomeMessage.title: The welcome message for the webchat for the widget config

widgetType.description: The type of the widget. Examples are: 'inbox', 'my-listings', 'snapshot', etc.

v1WidgetPosition.title:
- WIDGET_POSITION_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified widget position
 - WIDGET_POSITION_RIGHT: Widget position on the right side of the page
 - WIDGET_POSITION_LEFT: Widget position on the left side of the page

visitId.title: The id of the visit for tracking (short-lived "session" id of a visitor to a website hosting the widget)

visitorId.title: The id of the visitor for tracking (long-lived user id of a visitor to a website hosting the widget)

v1WidgetVisit.title: Cookie "session" data for tracking a visitor to a website hosting the widget

paths.description: The set of field mask paths.

vendastatypesFieldMask.title: `FieldMask` represents a set of symbolic field paths, for example:

The namespace of the widget e.g. "ABC", "AG-123"
